LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Cobalt.label: M7 "Cobalt"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Cobalt.description: A medium quadruped cargo mech with integrated machine gun. Features shotgun-resistant armor plating, cargo hauling capability, and smoke grenade deployment system.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Cobalt.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Gonk.label: XM3 "Gonk"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Gonk.description: A heavy self-propelled artillery mech with tank-level armor, very slow movement, and extreme long-range firepower. Based on the geochelone chassis.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Gonk.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.label: M110 "Omaha"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.description: An amphibious assault mech capable of operating both on land and water, providing close to mid-range fire support for USAC operations. Based on the Krepost heavy walker chassis.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.tools.left_leg.label: left leg
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Omaha.tools.right_leg.label: right leg
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.label: M939 "Paraman"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.description: A medium mechanized airborne unit. Designed for rapid deployment operations with enhanced mobility and moderate firepower. Based on the battle frame chassis.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Paraman.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.label: M88 "Rocky"
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.description: A USAC Marine Corps synthetic infantry unit. Designed to use standard infantry weapons and can wear human armor. Provides basic infantry support with moderate protection.
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.USAC_Mech_Rocky.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
